nodes.text: Denth  was a male Chiss employee of Galactic Solutions Industries during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Invasion of Ziost in 3636 BBY he was present at the GSI orbital station above the planet, from which he witnessed the devastation of Ziost.
Denth was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic in game update 3.2.[source?]
